translations: 讲师；演讲者（lecturer 的复数）

sentences.sentence: College lecturers acted as external assessors of the exam results.
sentences.translation: 学院讲师是考试成绩的校外考核人。

sentences.sentence: I am Professor Cathy Drennen, and I'm one of the lecturers in this course.
sentences.translation: 我是凯茜·德伦教授，同时也是这课的讲师之一。

sentences.sentence: Lecturers typically give much more accessible descriptions of theoretical perspectives in their oral presentations than can be found in the academic literature.
sentences.translation: 与学术文献相比，演讲者通常在口头报告中对理论观点给出更容易理解的描述。
